definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
variant of 三個臭皮匠，賽過一個諸葛亮|三个臭皮匠，赛过一个诸葛亮[san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , sai4 guo4 yi1 ge4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4]
pinyin: san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , sheng4 guo4 yi1 ge4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4
containing_words.word: 三個臭皮匠，勝過一個諸葛亮

sentences.english: I can out-argue you any day.
sentences.chinese: 任何時候我都可以在辯論中勝過你。

sentences.english: The New Age person often prefers a direct spiritual experience rather than one from organized religion.
sentences.chinese: 新時代人經常寧愛直接的靈性體驗勝過有組織的宗教。

sentences.english: A Stitch in Time Saves Nine Billion.
sentences.chinese: 及時一秒勝過事後九億秒。

sentences.english: One good father is worth a hundred schoolmasters.
sentences.chinese: 一個好父親勝過一百個教師。

sentences.english: And, dying, it rises above its own agony to outcarol the lark and the nightingale.
sentences.chinese: 它超脫了垂死的劇痛，歌聲勝過百靈和夜鶯。

sentences.english: There is a saying in China, "a bite when hungry is better appreciated than a feast when full."
sentences.chinese: 中國有句話叫飢餓時喂一口，勝過飽足時給一頓。

sentences.english: He once again nosed ahead of me on the horse race last week.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期的馬賽上，他又一次以微弱優勢勝過了我。

sentences.english: Kasich trails Trump by nearly 900 delegates.
sentences.chinese: 卡西奇小徑勝過了近900名代表。

sentences.english: And king Solomon passed all the kings of the earth in riches and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門王的財富和智慧，勝過世上的列王。

sentences.english: He prized it beyond everything else.
sentences.chinese: 他愛惜這件東西勝過其他一切。

sentences.english: And I saw that wisdom excels folly as light excels darkness.
sentences.chinese: 我便看出智慧勝過愚昧，如同光明勝過黑暗。

sentences.english: And I saw that wisdom excels folly as light excels darkness.
sentences.chinese: 我便看出智慧勝過愚昧，如同光明勝過黑暗。

sentences.english: Father is one hundred head masters.
sentences.chinese: 一個父親勝過百個老師。

sentences.english: One enemy can do lot hurt dawn ten friends can do bad.
sentences.chinese: 一個敵人爲害，勝過十個同學行好。

sentences.english: Historically, sea power overcomes land power.
sentences.chinese: 從歷史上來看，海權國家勝過陸權國家。

sentences.english: Under certain conditions, monkeys could sometimes outperform college students.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況下，猴子能勝過大學生。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
